value:
$nMPID_神階エイル|The sea is a precious treasure, full of
life. We must not allow it to be
corrupted by conflict.

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Much like the realm of life, the ocean
nurtures so many of the living
creatures of this world.

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|It's plain to see how mature Eir has
become. I'm very proud of her, but at
the same time...I mourn what's lost.

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Let's take a run along the beach
together, Eir. I want to feel the sand
under my feet!

$nMPID_神階エイル|The notion of summer is still new to
me. There was nothing like it in the
realm of the dead...

I am Ymir, and this is Eir. We are
having a summer celebration over at
$Nf's castle.

$nMPID_神階エイル|With Ymir by my side...everything
seems to shine a little brighter.

$nMPID_神階エイル|The sun engenders life. When I stand
in its rays, I can feel its power...

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Don't overdo it, Eir! Be sure to take
breaks and drink plenty of water.

$nMPID_神階エイル|I will do my part to make certain that
life in this world endures.

Look, Eir! The ocean is the source of
all life. Don't you feel a connection
to it?

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Look at you, all grown up. And the
two of us, enjoying our time together
on the beach. It's like a dream!$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Yes—and it is thanks to you and our
friends in the Order of Heroes that
I'm able to be here.$k$pYou rescued me from that deathly
prison, and brought me into the light
of the sun. I am eternally grateful.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Think nothing of it. Now, let's focus
on making happy memories from here
on out. We have a lot to make up for.$k$p$nMPID_神階エイル|Agreed. Let's enjoy ourselves—and
preserve the radiance of life, so that
we can all go on doing so.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Well said! Life in Askr shall flourish
for as long as the sun shines!
$nMPID_二人|Have a lively summer!
$nMPID_二人|Together! Yes.
$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Enjoying the weather?
$nMPID_神階エイル|A dazzling light...
I wanted more...
Easy.
I am with you.
"Look at the flowers." "Beautiful..."
"This heat..." "Be strong!"

"What a delicious drink! Shall we try the frozen treats next?"
"I am...quite full..."
Hmm...
A competition, then!
I will try.
$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Eir! Have a look at this!
$nMPID_神階エイル|Again? What is it this time?

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Crabs. And starfish! Aren't they
just lovely? Sea creatures are
adorable, don't you think?
$nMPID_神階エイル|They are small, but full of life.

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|You've grown so reserved. Long
ago, I could count on you to be
much livelier.

$nMPID_神階エイル|Do you mean when I was a child?
Of course I have changed as I've
gotten older...

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|I understand that. But there is so
much I wish we hadn't missed.

I wanted to be there for you as you
grew up. We would have had so
much fun!

We could have played hide-and-seek,
picked flowers...whatever we wanted.

$nMPID_神階エイル|Your kindness gladdens me...
Thank you.

Being with you now is enough for
me, however. I am content.

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|Are you sure? It seems a shame
to miss out on all those fun games.

$nMPID_神階エイル|Are you certain you're not the
one who wants to be playing
hide-and-seek, Ymir?

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|What? Of course not! Though I do
happen to be quite good at it.
Especially in the forest.

$nMPID_神階エイル|Ehehe... Very well then, let's play.
Since we're not in a forest now,
perhaps I will stand a chance.

$nMPID_比翼ユーミル|You want to? Truly? Very well! I shall
be the first to hide. Best of luck
finding me—I don't think you will!

$nMPID_神階エイル|We'll see. You have until I count to
thirty. One, two, three...
